articles.title: 'We really listened to our users': Samsung's product chief explains why the Galaxy Z Fold 7 doesn't support the S Pen - TechRadar

articles.content: Samsung unveiled the new Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE at its latest Galaxy Unpacked showcase this week, and while all three phones bring a host of welcome improvements, th… [+6378 chars]
